attributes.action: Apply pressure to the Football Association to terminate Steve McClaren's contract as England manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: England have two potentially easy games between now and when we next face Israel in September which England can win managerless. The FA must take this opportunity to fire Steve McClaren and spend the next five months working to select a suitable successor.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
